title: Fix issues with harfbuzz strings
body:
**Description of Change**

It appears that `ArrayPool<T>` does not reset the arrays, C# strings do not have a `\0` termination character and `new string(buffer)` will keep going.

This PR adds some cases to test for this, and then fixes it.

**Bugs Fixed**

- Fixes #1031 

**API Changes**

None

**Behavioral Changes**

Fixes the case where managed string were not null terminated.

**PR Checklist**

- [x] Has tests (if omitted, state reason in description)
- [x] Rebased on top of master at time of PR
- [x] Changes adhere to coding standard
- [x] Updated documentation
